text:
@GregAbbott_TX Texas is seen as having a gov w/ total disregard for the significantly increased number of COVID-19 cases, hospitalizations & deaths in the reopening!Caution & mask-wearing must be emphasized even if it makes Trump mad!  
Save lives!Listen to health professionals!Study the data!
